mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member(id, password, email, nickName, phoneNum, introduce, name) VALUES(#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{phoneNum}, #{introduce}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM Member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(nickName) FROM Member WHERE nickName = #{nickName}
SELECT COUNT(email) FROM Member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, password, email, nickName, phoneNum, introduce, name, inserted FROM Member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, password, email, nickName, phoneNum, introduce, name, inserted FROM Member ORDER BY inserted DESC
